Class: Scene

Scene()

new Scene()

- Scene for rendering 2d objects.
Properties:
Name Type Description
willRender boolean engine will render this scene depending on this.
objects Array.<Object2D> objects to render
sprites Array.<Sprite> sprites buffer or image
entities Array.<Entity> entities for scene
Source:
  • Scene/index.js, line 1

Methods

render()

render method for engine it will render all this.objects and this.entities
